## ABC

> "At its heart, ABC is a very sim- ple method: numerical evaluation of the likelihood function is replaced with an assessment of how likely it is the model could have produced the observed data, based on simulating pseudo-data from the model and comparing it to the observed data." [@Sisson2018-ke]
